sense.def:
Kadar neki položaj, ki je prej obstajal,
still exists
, se nadaljuje in obstaja še zdaj.

Kadar nekaj, kar se še ni zgodilo
could still happen
, je mogoče, da se bo zgodilo.

seg.quote: She could still change her mind.
There is still a chance that a few might survive.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
still
poudarimo, da je nekaj resnično ali tako, kot je.

seg.quote: Whatever they have done, they are still your parents.
There are ten weeks still to go.

sense.def:
Izraz
still
uporabimo tudi, kadar odpravimo težavo ali problem, češ da zato ni vredno biti v skrbeh.

seg.quote: ...and that made me miss the last bus. Still, that's life, isn't it?

sense.def:
Izraz
still
lahko uporabimo z
better
ali
more
, kadar hočemo povedati, da ima nekaj še več določene lastnosti kot nekaj drugega.

seg.quote: How about some Bach to begin with? Or, better still, Vivaldi.

sense.def:
To stay still
pomeni ostati v istem položaju, ne da bi se premaknili.

seg.quote: We had to keep still for about four minutes.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
still
, se ne premika ali ni dejavno.

seg.quote: Around them the forest was very still.
The stillness of the fields was broken by the sound of a gunshot.
